resources.name: Add new recipe
resources.description: Write in body to change new recipe added

body.text:
{
    "title": "Lebanese Tabbouleh Salad",
    "servings": 6,
    "cookingTime": 25,
    "difficulty": "easy",
    "mealType": "dinner",
    "nationality": "Lebanese",
    "ingredients": [
      "1/4 cup fine bulgur wheat",
      "4 cups fresh parsley, finely chopped",
      "1 cup fresh mint leaves, finely chopped",
      "4 green onions, finely chopped",
      "2 medium tomatoes, diced small",
      "1 English cucumber, diced small",
      "1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil",
      "1/4 cup fresh lemon juice",
      "1 tsp salt",
      "1/2 tsp black pepper",
      "1/4 tsp ground allspice (optional)",
      "Romaine lettuce leaves for serving",
      "Lemon wedges for serving"
    ],
    "instructions": [
      "Place bulgur in a small bowl and cover with water. Let soak for 15 minutes until tender, then drain well, pressing out excess water.",
      "In a large bowl, combine parsley, mint, green onions, tomatoes, and cucumber.",
      "Add drained bulgur to the herb mixture and toss gently to combine.",
      "In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and allspice if using.",
      "Pour dressing over the salad and toss well to coat.",
      "Let the salad rest in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.",
      "Taste and adjust seasoning if needed before serving.",
      "Serve chilled on romaine lettuce leaves with lemon wedges on the side."
    ]
  }

{
		"title": "Garlic Butter Shrimp",
		"servings": 42,
		"cookingTime": 25,
		"difficulty": "easy",
		"mealType": "dinner",
		"nationality": "Italian",
		"ingredients": [
			"8 oz linguine pasta",
			"2 tbsp olive oil",
			"4 tbsp butter",
			"4 cloves garlic, minced",
			"1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined",
			"1/2 tsp red pepper flakes",
			"1/2 cup white wine (or chicken broth)",
			"2 tbsp lemon juice",
			"1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese",
			"2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped",
			"Salt and black pepper to taste"
		],
		"instructions": [
			"Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water before draining.",
			"In a large skillet, heat olive oil and 2 tbsp butter over medium-high heat.",
			"Add shrimp, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 1-2 minutes per side until pink. Remove and set aside.",
			"In the same skillet, add remaining butter and garlic. Cook for 1 minute until fragrant.",
			"Add red pepper flakes and white wine. Simmer for 2-3 minutes until slightly reduced.",
			"Return shrimp to the skillet, add lemon juice and drained pasta. Toss to combine, adding pasta water as needed to create a sauce.",
			"Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and parsley before serving."
		]
	}
